archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to allow micropurchases on my owned products and services and want to set a $ limit to how much this can be

properties.value: PC: Who should be able to set a limit, what would be the split of a limit, per service? Primary account holder to set limits. Preference is one capped amount per month i.e. $50 of micropurchase activity. We will need to set an upper limit too tbc

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
